title: Bug 50793 - Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: The bug report highlights an issue where the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC when a ServletRequestListener is invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(). However, the observed and expected behavior are not explicitly mentioned in the report.
OB: The observed behavior is not provided in the report.
EB: The expected behavior should be clarified in the report to ensure a clear understanding of the issue.
SR: To better understand and address the issue, the report should include details of the expected behavior and the specific steps to reproduce the problem.
